CustomField.formula: CASE (TEXT(Referral_Account__r.Referral_Type__c) , "52 Bank Tier 1" , "Bank - Tier 1" , "52 Bank Tier 2" , "Bank - Tier 2" ,CASE (TEXT(Referral_Account__r.Referral_Source_Business_Type__c) ,"Financial Services", "Bank - Tier 2" ,"Accounting Firm", "CPA" ,"Strategic Accountant Firm", "CPA" ,"Strategic Account", "Strategic Partner" ,"Broker", "Financial Advisor" ,"Broker Dealer", "Financial Advisor" ,"Broker Dealer Branch", "Financial Advisor" ,"Insurance Carrier", "Insurance Agent" ,"Insurance Broker", "Insurance Agent" ,"Other", "Other" ,"Paychex Co",IF( TEXT(Referral_Account__r.ReferralSourceSubType__c)=="Advance Partners","Advance Partners","") ,"" ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The name to use for the Referral Partner when creating a Referral record.
CustomField.label: Referral Partner Name
